text: I kogda Avraam skazal: "Gospodi, pokazhi mne, kak ozhivlyayesh' Ty mortvykh!" On skazal: "Uzheli ty ne verish'?" On skazal: "Naprotiv, a tol'ko dlya togo, chtoby uspokoit' serdtse moyo". On skazal: "Tak voz'mi chetyrokh ptits, rasseki ikh na kuski, kakiye ty khochesh', i chasti ikh razlozhi po goram; potom pozovi ikh: oni bystro priletyat k tebe; iz etogo uznay, chto Bog silon, mudr
